summary: This is an email from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (SDNY) containing a list of daily news clippings from May 26, 2021. The clippings cover various topics, including updates on the Ghislaine Maxwell case, investigations involving Rudy Giuliani and Donald Trump, and other legal and political news.

persons.name: Nicholas Biasc
persons.context: Appears as the sender of the SDNY daily news clippings email.

persons.name: Rudy Giuliani
persons.context: Mentioned in a news clipping about federal investigators seizing more information in a case against him.

persons.name: Steve Bannon
persons.context: Mentioned in a news clipping about his fraud case being dismissed after a pardon from Donald Trump.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Mentioned in a news clipping about her lawyers asking a judge to throw out the Jeffrey Epstein sexual abuse case.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.role: Deceased financier and accused sex trafficker
persons.context: Mentioned in the context of the sexual abuse case against Ghislaine Maxwell.

persons.name: Donald Trump
persons.context: Mentioned in relation to pardoning Steve Bannon and being the subject of a grand jury probe by the Manhattan DA.

persons.name: Elizabeth Warren
persons.context: Mentioned in a news clipping headline about the Federal Reserve and Credit Suisse.

persons.name: Kirsten Gillibrand
persons.context: Mentioned in a news clipping about teaming up on a military sexual assault bill.

persons.name: Josh Hawley
persons.context: Mentioned in a news clipping about teaming up on a military sexual assault bill.

connections.description: Maxwell is a defendant in the sexual abuse case related to Epstein's activities.
Trump pardoned Bannon, leading to the dismissal of Bannon's fraud case.
Teamed up on a military sexual assault bill.

events.title: SDNY Daily News Clippings Compilation
events.description: The U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York distributes a list of news articles covering legal and political developments.

events.title: Ghislaine Maxwell's Lawyers File Motion to Dismiss
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell's lawyers ask a judge to throw out the Jeffrey Epstein sexual abuse case.

events.title: Steve Bannon's Fraud Case Dismissed
events.description: Steve Bannon's fraud case is dismissed months after receiving a pardon from Donald Trump.

events.title: Manhattan DA Grand Jury Convened for Trump Investigation
events.description: The Manhattan District Attorney convenes a grand jury to consider potential charges in an investigation related to Donald Trump.

keyFacts: The document is an internal SDNY email compiling news clippings from May 26, 2021.
One clipping reports that Ghislaine Maxwell's lawyers asked a judge to dismiss the Jeffrey Epstein sexual abuse case.
Another clipping notes the dismissal of Steve Bannon's fraud case following a pardon from Donald Trump.
A clipping indicates the Manhattan DA convened a grand jury in an investigation potentially involving Donald Trump.
The email shows the SDNY press office monitoring media coverage of various high-profile legal and political matters.
